paragraph.paragraph:
Removing EiffelEnvision project references under the ../../structure/references/references_folder.xmlReferences Folder is done in the same way ../adding_items/index.xmlProject Items are ../removing_items.xmlremoved.
Select the project reference in the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog.htmSolution Explorer
Select Edit, Remove (from the main menu. You may also use the default DEL shortcut key.
The reference will then be removed from the project.

There a some references, under the ../../structure/references/references_folder.xmlReferences Folder, that cannot be removed like other references. These are Static References and are denoted by the ../../../../images/icons/assembly_static.ico icon. These references are managed by EiffelEnvision projects and its ../project_configuration/index.xmlconfiguration.
paragraph.seealso: See also: index.xmlProject Referencesms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxtskaddingremovingprojectreferences.htmAdding and Removing Project References../../structure/references/references_folder.xmlReferences Folder
